definitions: in a way that relates to the running of a home or to family relations

examples.text: I am becoming a domestically disorganized mess

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to running of home or to family relations

examples.text: barn owls can be kept domestically

definitions: in a way that relates to activities inside a particular country; nationally

examples.text: only a quarter of French locomotives were domestically produced
the company has a high reputation both domestically and internationally

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to activities inside particular country
